0.question: How does data security work?
0.answer: We use end-to-end encryption and secure storage on Supabase, with ISO 27001 certification. Your data is protected with the highest industry security standards, including daily automatic backups.

1.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
1.answer: Yes! You can cancel at any time without fines, fees or bureaucracy. Your plan remains active until the end of the paid period, and you keep access to all your data.

2.question: How does the integrated WhatsApp work?
2.answer: You can record financial transactions and make queries by chatting naturally with Dona Wilma on WhatsApp. Just send messages like 'spent 50 at the grocery store' or 'how much did I spend this month?' ‚Äî no need to open the app!

3.question: How can I try Dona Wilma?
3.answer: When you subscribe to the plan, you'll have immediate access to all Dona Wilma features. Discount coupons may occasionally be available for new users.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using the Dona Wilma service ("Service"), you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, do not use the Service. The Service is provided by Aligator ("Company").

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: Dona Wilma is a personal financial and appointment management platform that uses artificial intelligence to categorize transactions and organize schedules. The service includes WhatsApp integration, Google Calendar, and a web dashboard.

account.title: 3. Registration and Account
account.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials. All activities performed on your account are your responsibility. You must provide accurate and up-to-date information during registration.

payment.title: 4. Plans and Payment
payment.content: The Service offers free and paid plans. Paid plans are charged on a recurring basis (monthly or annual) via Stripe. You can cancel at any time through the subscription management portal. There are no prorated refunds for periods already paid.

acceptableUse.title: 5. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You agree not to use the Service for illegal, fraudulent purposes or that violate the rights of third parties. Abusive use of the WhatsApp bot (spam, bulk messages) may result in account suspension.

ip.title: 6. Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content, design, and code of the Service are the property of the Company. Your financial and personal data remain your property.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: The Service is provided "as is". The Company is not responsible for financial decisions made based on information from the Service. Automatic AI categorization may contain inaccuracies and should be verified by the user.

modifications.title: 8. Modifications
modifications.content: The Company reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Significant changes will be communicated by email or notification in the Service.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: For questions about these terms, contact us at: contato@donawilma.com.br

dataCollected.title: 1. Data Collected
dataCollected.content: We collect the following data: email, name, phone number (WhatsApp), financial data entered by you (transactions, categories), appointments, and payment information processed by Stripe.

dataUsage.title: 2. Data Usage
dataUsage.content: Your data is used exclusively to: provide the Service (categorization, reports, reminders), process payments, send notifications about your account and appointments, and improve the Service with aggregated and anonymous analysis.

sharing.title: 3. Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties for marketing purposes. We share data only with: Stripe (payment processing), Meta/WhatsApp (message delivery), Google (calendar sync, when authorized by you), and Supabase (secure data storage).

ai.title: 4. Artificial Intelligence
ai.content: We use AI (OpenAI) to process your WhatsApp messages and categorize transactions. Messages are sent securely and are not used to train third-party AI models. Processed data is stored only in your account.

security.title: 5. Security
security.content: We use encryption in transit (HTTPS/TLS) and at rest. Data is stored on secure servers with restricted access. We implement secure authentication and role-based access policies (RLS).

rights.title: 6. Your Rights (LGPD)
rights.content: Under the General Data Protection Law (LGPD), you have the right to: access your data, correct inaccurate data, request deletion of your data, revoke consent, and request data portability. To exercise these rights, contact us at: contato@donawilma.com.br

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies to keep your login session active. We do not use tracking or advertising cookies.

retention.title: 8. Data Retention
retention.content: Your data is kept as long as your account is active. After cancellation, data is retained for 30 days for possible reactivation and then permanently deleted.

dpo.title: 9. Data Protection Officer (DPO)
dpo.content: For questions related to privacy and data protection, contact: contato@donawilma.com.br
